answers.answer: I ended up with a sinus infection in the last month with my 2nd baby.  Those always turn into bronchitis for Mr so I got on antibiotics.   I didn't want to be sick and unable to see my baby when he was born.  Is there a reason you don't want antibiotics?

I do not mind antibiotics, but I would prefer home remedies if possible.. antibiotics always gives me the yeasty beasties... and I would not want that, but it steadier to bare than a son is infection for me.
Be careful with cold meds they tend to rise ur pressure. I increased my prenatal vitamins and drunk soup and took diabetes cold meds.

question: I can feel myself developing a cold.. so far I have freezing nose and fingers,  nasal dripping, lots of boogies and extreme fatigue/weakness.. I am a month away from delivery and I dont want to take antibiotics.. I am afraid this is going to turn into my routine sinus infection and I want to prevent that.. please help. .
title: Help I am Developing a Cold
